code: "use strict";import StyleSheet from"react-native-web/dist/exports/StyleSheet";const APPROX_APP_BAR_HEIGHT=56;const DEFAULT_DRAWER_WIDTH=360;const getDefaultDrawerWidth=({width})=>{if(width-APPROX_APP_BAR_HEIGHT<=360){return width-APPROX_APP_BAR_HEIGHT;}return DEFAULT_DRAWER_WIDTH;};export function getDrawerWidth({layout,drawerStyle}){const{width=getDefaultDrawerWidth(layout)}=StyleSheet.flatten(drawerStyle)||{};if(typeof width==='string'&&width.endsWith('%')){const percentage=Number(width.replace(/%$/,''));if(Number.isFinite(percentage)){return layout.width*(percentage/100);}}return typeof width==='number'?width:0;}
